Articles.Content:
I had just performed a nice mun landing, so I decided to do it again and record another one with Bandicam. I also added some happy music because I read a post about the mun being creepy. Here it is:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qY648LBufZM

It's almost no sound from the game. I just wanted to show off the building skills I learned from this thread.
